dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-dask
dependencies.description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.

dependencies.name: py-distributed
dependencies.description: Distributed scheduler for Dask

dependencies.name: py-numba
dependencies.description: NumPy aware dynamic Python compiler using LLVM

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn
dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description:
SciPy (pronounced "Sigh Pie") is a Scientific Library for Python. It
provides many user-friendly and efficient numerical routines such as
routines for numerical integration and optimization.

dependencies.name: py-dask-glm
dependencies.description:
Dask-glm is a library for fitting Generalized Linear Models on large
datasets.

dependencies.name: py-multipledispatch
dependencies.description: A relatively sane approach to multiple dispatch in Python.

dependencies.name: py-packaging
dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-graphviz
dependencies.description: Simple Python interface for Graphviz

dependencies.name: py-heapdict
dependencies.description: A heap with decrease-key and increase-key operations

dependencies.name: py-ipykernel
dependencies.description: IPython Kernel for Jupyter

dependencies.name: py-ipython
dependencies.description:
IPython provides a rich toolkit to help you make the most out of using
Python interactively.

dependencies.name: py-nbsphinx
dependencies.description:
nbsphinx is a Sphinx extension that provides a source parser for *.ipynb
files.

dependencies.name: py-nose
dependencies.description:
nose extends the test loading and running features of unittest, making
it easier to write, find and run tests.

dependencies.name: py-numpydoc
dependencies.description: numpydoc - Numpy's Sphinx extensions

dependencies.name: py-sortedcontainers
dependencies.description:
Sorted Containers is an Apache2 licensed sorted collections library,
written in pure-Python, and fast as C-extensions.

dependencies.name: py-sphinx
dependencies.description: Sphinx Documentation Generator.

dependencies.name: py-sphinx-rtd-theme
dependencies.description: ReadTheDocs.org theme for Sphinx.

dependencies.name: py-sphinx-gallery
dependencies.description:
A `Sphinx` extension that builds an HTML version of any Python script
and puts it into an examples gallery.

dependencies.name: py-testpath
dependencies.description:
Testpath is a collection of utilities for Python code working with files
and commands.

dependencies.name: py-tornado
dependencies.description: Tornado is a Python web framework and asynchronous networking library.

dependencies.name: py-zict
dependencies.description: Mutable mapping tools

dependencies.name: py-dask-sphinx-theme
dependencies.description: Sphinx theme for Dask documentation.

dependencies.name: py-xgboost
dependencies.description:
XGBoost is an optimized distributed gradient boosting library designed
to be highly efficient, flexible and portable.
